offerings.title: Flight Bookings
offerings.description: Best prices on domestic and international flights with instant confirmation
offerings.long_description: Book flights to 200+ destinations worldwide. We offer competitive pricing, quick confirmations, and 24/7 customer support for all your flight needs.
benefits: Save up to 40% on airline tickets
Free cancellation up to 7 days before

offerings.title: Hotels & Stays
offerings.long_description: Choose from luxury 5-star resorts to budget-friendly hotels. We've partnered with over 50,000 properties globally to ensure best rates.

offerings.title: Tour Packages
offerings.description: Customized tours for every budget and preference
offerings.long_description: From budget backpacking to luxury tours, we design personalized itineraries for individual travelers, families, and groups.

offerings.title: Visa Assistance
offerings.description: Expert visa support and documentation for 50+ countries
offerings.long_description: Get expert guidance on visa requirements, documentation, and application processes for major travel destinations.

offerings.title: Cab & Transport
offerings.description: Reliable ground transportation across India and abroad
offerings.long_description: Premium cab rental services with experienced drivers for city tours, intercity travel, and airport transfers.

offerings.title: Holiday Packages
offerings.description: Special packages for festivals, New Year, and holidays
offerings.long_description: Celebrate special occasions with our curated holiday packages including accommodations, meals, and activities.
benefits: Up to 30% savings on holiday deals
